# k8s_security_profiles_operator_x_k8s_io_security_profile_node_status_v1alpha1 (Data Source)

SecurityProfileNodeStatus is a per-node status of a security profile

  metadata = {
    name      = "some-name"
    namespace = "some-namespace"

  }
